alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lincoln and northwestern Flathead Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 235 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles west of Whitefish, or 30 miles northwest of Kalispell, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Lincoln and northwestern Flathead Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
